name: jetleaf_validation
desc: JetLeaf Validation Library üçÉ

name: AbstractExecutableValidator
desc:
A base implementation of the ExecutableValidator interface that provides
the foundational logic for executing and orchestrating annotation-driven
validation in the JetLeaf validation framework.

name: buildViolation
desc: Constructs a detailed ConstraintViolation instance for a failed constraint.

name: createContext
desc:
Creates a new SimpleValidationContext bound to the current
Environment instance.

name: findAllConstraints
desc: Finds all constraints associated with a given source.

name: getActiveGroups
desc: Resolves the active validation groups for a constraint evaluation.

name: getConstraintValidators
desc:
Discovers and resolves all active constraint validators defined on the
given Source (such as a method parameter, return value, or field).

name: getEnvironment
desc: Provides access to the currently active JetLeaf Environment.

name: getValidationGroups
desc: Resolves the active validation groups declared on the given Source.

name: hasConstraint
desc:
Checks whether the given source (e.g., class, field, or method parameter)
is annotated with one or more validation-related annotations.

name: hasValidAnnotation
desc: Checks whether the given Source is annotated with @Valid.

name: hasValidatedAnnotation
desc: Checks whether the given Source is annotated with @Validated.

name: isInGroup
desc:
Determines whether the provided set of constraintGroups intersects
with the currently active validation groups.

name: resolveActiveGroups
desc: Resolves the effective validation groups for a given Source.

name: shouldValidate
desc:
Determines whether a given WhenValidating annotation should participate
in the current validation run based on the active validation groups.

name: validateParameters
desc:
Validates all parameters of the given method against their
associated constraint annotations.

name: validateReturnValue
desc: Validates the return value of a method after successful execution.

name: Constraint
desc:
A meta-annotation in JetLeaf Validation used to associate a
specific ConstraintValidator implementation with a custom constraint
annotation.

name: Constraint.new
desc:
Creates a new Constraint annotation that binds a specific
ConstraintValidator implementation to a constraint annotation.

name: FIELD_KEY
desc: The key used to store or retrieve validator annotations in metadata.

name: annotationType
desc:
Returns the runtime type of this annotation for reflection-based
discovery within the JetLeaf validation subsystem.

name: validators
desc:
The ConstraintValidator responsible for enforcing the constraint
logic associated with the annotated constraint annotation.

name: ConstraintPayload
desc:
Marker interface in JetLeaf Validation representing metadata payloads
attached to validation constraints.

name: ConstraintValidator
desc:
A foundational JetLeaf Validation API contract that defines how
custom validation logic is applied to annotated elements.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: ConstraintViolation
desc:
Represents a single validation failure detected during constraint
evaluation.

name: getConstraintAnnotation
desc: The constraint annotation instance that triggered the violation.

name: getGroups
desc: The validation groups that this violation belongs to.

name: getInvalidValue
desc: The invalid value that triggered this constraint violation.

name: getMessage
desc: The human-readable message describing the violation.

name: getPayloads
desc: The payloads attached to this violation.

name: getPropertyPath
desc: The property path where the violation occurred.

name: getSource
desc: The source element associated with the violation.

name: ConstraintViolationException
desc:
Represents a runtime exception thrown when one or more constraint
violations are detected during validation.

name: ConstraintViolationException.new
desc:
Represents a runtime exception thrown when one or more constraint
violations are detected during validation.

name: allViolations
desc: Returns all ConstraintViolation instances captured in the report.

name: report
desc: The validation report containing all detected constraint violations.

name: toString
desc:
Returns a human-readable string representation of the exception,
including a concise, one-line summary of all violations.

name: DefaultGroup
desc: Represents the default validation group within the JetLeaf validation framework.

name: getClass
desc:
Returns the reflective Class instance representing the
DefaultGroup type within the validation package.

name: Email
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated element
is a syntactically valid email address according to the RFC 5322 standard,
or a custom regular expression if provided.

name: Email.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated element
is a syntactically valid email address according to the RFC 5322 standard,
or a custom regular expression if provided.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: pattern
desc: Email validation pattern (RFC 5322 compliant by default)

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: EmailConstraintValidator
desc:
A concrete ConstraintValidator implementation in JetLeaf Validation
responsible for enforcing the @Email constraint on String-typed fields.

name: EmailConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A concrete ConstraintValidator implementation in JetLeaf Validation
responsible for enforcing the @Email constraint on String-typed fields.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: ExecutableValidator
desc:
Defines the contract for method-level validation, providing APIs to
validate both parameters and return values of executable members
(methods, constructors, etc.).

name: validateParameters
desc:
Validates all parameters of the given method against their
associated constraint annotations.

name: validateReturnValue
desc: Validates the return value of a method after successful execution.

name: InFuture
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
DateTime element represents a point in the future relative
to the current system or application timezone.

name: InFuture.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
DateTime element represents a point in the future relative
to the current system or application timezone.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: InFutureConstraintValidator
desc:
A ConstraintValidator implementation that validates whether a given
DateTime value represents a future point in time relative to the
current moment.

name: InFutureConstraintValidator.new
desc: Creates a new timezone-aware InFutureConstraintValidator.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: InPast
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated DateTime value
is in the past relative to the current time.

name: InPast.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated DateTime value
is in the past relative to the current time.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: InPastConstraintValidator
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that checks whether
a given DateTime value represents a moment in the past, as
specified by the `@InPast` annotation.

name: InPastConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that checks whether
a given DateTime value represents a moment in the past, as
specified by the `@InPast` annotation.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: Max
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
numeric element does not exceed a specified maximum value.

name: Max.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
numeric element does not exceed a specified maximum value.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: value
desc: The maximum allowed value (inclusive).

name: MaxConstraintValidator
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that enforces
upper-bound numerical limits defined by the `@Max` annotation.

name: MaxConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that enforces
upper-bound numerical limits defined by the `@Max` annotation.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: Min
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
numeric element does not fall below a specified minimum value.

name: Min.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
numeric element does not fall below a specified minimum value.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: value
desc: The minimum allowed value (inclusive).

name: MinConstraintValidator
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that enforces
lower-bound numerical limits defined by the `@Min` annotation.

name: MinConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that enforces
lower-bound numerical limits defined by the `@Min` annotation.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: Negative
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated numeric
element is strictly negative (less than 0).

name: Negative.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated numeric
element is strictly negative (less than 0).

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: NegativeConstraintValidator
desc:
A concrete ConstraintValidator implementation in JetLeaf Validation
responsible for enforcing the @Negative constraint on numeric fields.

name: NegativeConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A concrete ConstraintValidator implementation in JetLeaf Validation
responsible for enforcing the @Negative constraint on numeric fields.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: NotBlank
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated String
is not null, empty, or composed solely of whitespace characters.

name: NotBlank.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated String
is not null, empty, or composed solely of whitespace characters.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: NotBlankConstraintValidator
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures
a string value is not blank, as defined by the `@NotBlank` annotation.

name: NotBlankConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures
a string value is not blank, as defined by the `@NotBlank` annotation.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: NotEmpty
desc: A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated value is not null or empty.

name: NotEmpty.new
desc: A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated value is not null or empty.

desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: NotEmptyConstraintValidator
desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures a value
is not empty, as defined by the `@NotEmpty` annotation.

desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures a value
is not empty, as defined by the `@NotEmpty` annotation.

name: NotNull
desc: A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated value is not null.

desc: A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated value is not null.

desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: toString

desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures a value
is not null, as defined by the `@NotNull` annotation.

desc:
A built-in JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures a value
is not null, as defined by the `@NotNull` annotation.

name: Pattern
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated String
value matches a specific regular expression pattern.

name: Pattern.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated String
value matches a specific regular expression pattern.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: regexp
desc: The regular expression pattern that the value must match.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

desc:
A JetLeaf constraint validator that verifies whether a given String
value matches a regular expression pattern, as defined by the
`@Pattern` annotation.

desc:
A JetLeaf constraint validator that verifies whether a given String
value matches a regular expression pattern, as defined by the
`@Pattern` annotation.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: Positive
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated numeric
element is strictly positive (greater than 0).

desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated numeric
element is strictly positive (greater than 0).

desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

desc:
A JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures a numeric value
is strictly greater than zero, as defined by the `@Positive` annotation.

desc:
A JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures a numeric value
is strictly greater than zero, as defined by the `@Positive` annotation.

name: Size
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
element‚Äôs size or length falls within a specified range [min, max].

name: Size.new
desc:
A constraint annotation that validates that the annotated
element‚Äôs size or length falls within a specified range [min, max].

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: max
desc: Maximum allowed size (inclusive).

name: min
desc: Minimum allowed size (inclusive).

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: SizeConstraintValidator
desc:
A JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures the annotated element‚Äôs
size, length, or numeric value lies within a specified inclusive range,
as defined by the `@Size` annotation.

name: SizeConstraintValidator.new
desc:
A JetLeaf constraint validator that ensures the annotated element‚Äôs
size, length, or numeric value lies within a specified inclusive range,
as defined by the `@Size` annotation.

name: isValid
desc: Evaluates whether value satisfies the constraint defined by annotation.

name: Valid
desc: Marks a field for recursive validation.

name: Valid.new
desc: Marks a field for recursive validation.

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: groups
desc: Optional list of validation groups to apply to the target field.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: Validated
desc:
Marks a method or a method parameter for validation according to
associated constraint annotations (e.g., @NotNull, @Email, @Size).

name: Validated.new
desc:
Marks a method or a method parameter for validation according to
associated constraint annotations (e.g., @NotNull, @Email, @Size).

name: annotationType
desc: Returns the annotation _type of this annotation.

name: group
desc: The optional validation group to which this parameter or method belongs.

name: toString
desc: Returns a string representation of this annotation.

name: ValidationAutoConfiguration
desc: JetLeaf auto-configuration entry point for the validation subsystem.

name: VALIDATION_AUTO_CONFIGURATION_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the ValidationAutoConfiguration.

name: VALIDATION_FACTORY_POD_NAME
desc: Pod name for the ValidationFactory.

name: ValidationAutoConfiguration.new
desc: JetLeaf auto-configuration entry point for the validation subsystem.

name: validationFactory
desc: Declares and exposes the default ValidationFactory pod.

name: ValidationContext
desc: Represents the execution context for constraint validation.

name: getEnvironment
desc: Returns the active Environment associated with this validation process.

name: ValidationFactory
desc:
A centralized, interceptor-aware validation engine responsible for
performing runtime constraint validation across objects, method parameters,
and return values within a JetLeaf application.

name: ValidationFactory.new
desc:
A centralized, interceptor-aware validation engine responsible for
performing runtime constraint validation across objects, method parameters,
and return values within a JetLeaf application.

name: afterReturning
desc: Invoked after a successful method execution.

name: beforeInvocation
desc: Executed immediately before the target method invocation.

name: canIntercept
desc: Determines whether this interceptor can intercept the specified method.

name: equalizedProperties
desc: Mixin-style contract for value-based equality, hashCode, and toString.

name: forExecutables
desc:
Returns an ExecutableValidator capable of validating method parameters
and return values for this validator.

name: getEnvironment
desc: Provides access to the currently active JetLeaf Environment.

name: setApplicationContext
desc: Sets the ApplicationContext that this component runs in.

name: validate
desc: Validates all constraints defined on the given target object.

name: validateProperty
desc: Validates the constraints applied to a specific property (field) of target.

name: ValidationReport
desc:
Represents the result of a validation process, encapsulating all
ConstraintViolations detected during execution.

name: getFirstViolationMessage
desc: Returns the first violation message, or null if no violations exist.

name: getViolations
desc: Returns all constraint violations discovered during validation.

name: getViolationsForProperty
desc: Returns all violations that occurred for a specific property path.

name: isValid
desc: Whether validation passed successfully (i.e., no violations detected).

name: Validator
desc: Defines the contract for pod validation at the object and property level.

name: forExecutables
desc:
Returns an ExecutableValidator capable of validating method parameters
and return values for this validator.

name: validate
desc: Validates all constraints defined on the given target object.

name: validateProperty
desc: Validates the constraints applied to a specific property (field) of target.

name: WhenValidating
desc:
Base class for all JetLeaf validation annotations that participate in
the declarative validation subsystem.

name: WhenValidating.new
desc:
Base class for all JetLeaf validation annotations that participate in
the declarative validation subsystem.

name: getMessage
desc: Returns the effective validation failure message for this constraint.

name: groups
desc: The validation groups this constraint belongs to.

name: payloads
desc: Optional metadata payloads attached to this constraint.
